data.message: Apologies if someone already asked this but is there a way to customize who shows up in Facebook stories? Ideally it would be nice to have it only show top friends or at least hide people I've unfollowed.

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Noelle. All of your friends (other than those on your restricted list) will have the option of viewing your story. They will proactively have to click on your picture within the stories section to view it.   People on your restricted list and people who are unfollowed won't see your content. We hope this helps! -Jon
